flawed_nl_solution:
After the birds ate 19 of the tomatoes Haruto has 127 - 19 = <<127-19=180>>180 tomatoes left.
After giving half of his tomatoes to his friend, Haruto had 180 / 2 = <<180/2=90>>90 tomatoes.
#### 90

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 108, not 180. It appears two adjacent digits were swapped.
